text: Joe Newton (1929 â€“ December 9, 2017) was an American high school cross country and track coach. He was a coach at York High School in Elmhurst, Illinois. He coached for over fifty years. He won 28 Illinois state cross country titles and one track state title. A documentary, The Long Green Line, about his life and career was made. Newton died on December 9, 2017, at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Illinois Category:Running coaches
title: Joe Newton
